description:
Protein packed bites of deliciousness to help keep you going. Made from a blend crisped grains and roasted nuts, held together with smooth almond butter and elevated with organic vanilla and hint of sea salt, Chic Choc Vanilla Almonds are a real treat.

  • Ingredients: almonds*, sunflower seeds*, sugars (cane sugar*, brown rice syrup*), toasted puffed rice*, hazelnuts*, puffed quinoa*, Arabic gum*, almond paste* (almonds), sesame seeds*, coconut flakes*, natural vanilla flavour*, sea salt. *Organic
  • Allergens: contains almonds
  • May contain: Brazil nuts, cashews, hazelnuts, pecans, pistachios, walnuts, sesame, soy milk
  • Prana is Montreal based family business committed to making healthy and delicious snacks, with low impact. When possible, Prana Organics uses locally sourced organic ingredients. When they can’t find what they need nearby, Prana Organics ensure the farmers they work with use sustainable farming practices and have fair working environments
name: Prana Organic Chic Choc Vanilla Almonds
